subject: Football (College)
College Football Playoff National Championship
lead_paragraph: The Crimson Tide, allowing just 13.4 points per game, have turned their surplus of talent into intensely specialized platoons, allowing them to counter any particular offensive look.
snippet: The Crimson Tide, allowing just 13.4 points per game, have turned their surplus of talent into intensely specialized platoons, allowing them to counter any particular offensive look.
